title: rpgitem4.09 右键指令 无权限
author: Pistol_Pangan
txt_content:
rpgitem4.09插件制作的道具右键给予玩家金钱的指令显示无权限。如图，权限设置是'*'但是普通玩家仍然显示无权限。
'2':
  name: '2'
  id: 2
  haspermission: false
  display: 奇怪的硬币
  quality: TRASH
  directDamage: true
  damageMin: 0
  damageMax: 3
  armour: 0
  armourNum: 0
  type: 消耗品
  hand: 类型
  lore: ''
  nbt: ''
  repairPrice: 0.0
  level: -1
  cost:
    exp: 0
    money: 0.0
  ignorePlugins: []
  description: []
  customlore: []
  onlyShowDescription: true
  item: CUSTOMNPCS_NPCANCIENTCOIN
  item_data: 0
  powers:
    '0':
      powerName: command
      eventType: RIGHTCLICK
      chance: 1
      cooldown: 0
      command: money give {player} 10
      display: 财运
      permission: '*'
    '1':
      powerName: consume
      eventType: RIGHTCLICK
  recipechance: 6
  hasRecipe: false
  dropChances: {}
  disappearChance: 0
  keep:
    lore: false
    enchant: false
  maxDurability: 0
  forceBar: false

replies.txt_content:
你都没给权限，，指令也是错的，正确命令：
/rpgitem xx power command 0 right 奖励金钱 `eco give {player} 233` essentials.eco
/rpgitem xx consume
